channel.title: City of Whispers (Play Test) - Tuesdays in Nov + Dec
channel.description:
**If you like your fantasy less epic and more street-level, come try City of Whispers with me on Tuesdays in November+December.**
* **What** : [City of Whispers](https://danmbrown.github.io/city-of-whispers/), a game in development about intrigue in a fantasy city * **When** : Tuesdays in November and December (9 sessions, 5pm Eastern US time) * **Who** : Hopefully, you!
I’ve been play-testing the crap out of my game [City of Whispers](https://danmbrown.github.io/city-of-whispers/), and I’d love to get even more perspectives and more feedback.
> City of Whispers is a game of medieval-style fantasy that takes place entirely in a single large city. This isn’t the epic adventure of Lord of the Rings, but instead intimate machinations of city politics, faction intrigue, uneasy partnerships, and back alley negotiations.
* Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJwTILLOhGJEkak3gH * Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJwZtUvb1f2guRdYzQ * Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJwiL8q5X3tzcs_Hvo * Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJwmy0RngrhWgwu2ag * Session 5: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJwrc_SKOBzhVo8RqJ * Session 6: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJx0N2KihEbUXgVtUy * Session 7: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJx51gTxJTSWjWBoVs * Session 8: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJxB5QIdS6GqWKWxcr * Session 9: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NDJxH4EMQNxTI8gApay

item.description:
@Skelly wrote:

Hi! I’m new to the Gauntlet and registered for today’s City of Whisper’s session, and can’t find my invitation to the zoom link.

Read full topic

item.title: City of Whispers (Play Test) - Tuesdays in Nov + Dec
item.dc:creator: @brownorama
item.description:
@brownorama wrote:

If you like your fantasy less epic and more street-level, come try City of Whispers with me on Tuesdays in November+December.

  • What : City of Whispers, a game in development about intrigue in a fantasy city
  • When : Tuesdays in November and December (9 sessions, 5pm Eastern US time)
  • Who : Hopefully, you!

I’ve been play-testing the crap out of my game City of Whispers, and I’d love to get even more perspectives and more feedback.

City of Whispers is a game of medieval-style fantasy that takes place entirely in a single large city. This isn’t the epic adventure of Lord of the Rings, but instead intimate machinations of city politics, faction intrigue, uneasy partnerships, and back alley negotiations.
